alert.note: Alert for Garland; Hot Spring; Saline (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 4:15PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Garland, central Saline and northeastern Hot Spring Counties through 500 PM CDT... At 415 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mountain Pine, or 8 miles north of Hot Springs, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hot Springs... Benton... Hot Springs Village... Haskell... Mountain Pine... Traskwood... Lonsdale... Jessieville... Lake Ouachita State Park... Hot Springs National Park... Salem in Saline County... Avilla... Nance... Mountain Valley... Congo... Glen Rose... Gulpha Gorge... Grape... Bland... Crows... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
